hero.subtitle: Kleff is an open-source hosting platform for modern teams. From a single service to fleets of applications, ship with Vercel-level DX while keeping full control over your infrastructure.

git_push.title: Git push deploys
git_push.description: Connect GitHub, GitLab, or your own registry.

self_hosted.title: Self-hosted first
self_hosted.description: Run Kleff on your own hardware or use our cloud.

trusted_by.mobile: Trusted by teams running Next.js, Go APIs, and microservices.

deploy_preview.title: Deploy preview created
deploy_preview.description: Share this URL with your team to review changes before promoting to production.

why_kleff.label: Why teams choose Kleff
why_kleff.title: Everything you need to go from
why_kleff.description: Kleff's core is open source. Run it on your own machines or use our managed offering — the workflow stays the same.

fast.title: Fast from day one
fast.description: Zero-config deploys, preview environments, and instant rollbacks — without drowning in YAML.

open.title: Open by default
open.description: Inspect the code, contribute features, and run the same stack locally, on-prem, or in any cloud.

visibility.title: Visibility first
visibility.description: Logs, metrics, and alerts that actually make sense. Plug into Prometheus/Grafana or use built-in dashboards.

platform.label: Kleff platform
platform.title: A complete toolkit for modern services.
platform.description: Mix and match the pieces you need: deployments, identity, observability, data, and automation — all with sane defaults and self-hostable control.

deployments.title: Deployments
deployments.description: Build and ship containers with zero-config pipelines.

rollbacks.title: Safe rollbacks
rollbacks.description: Instantly revert to a known-good deploy.

identity.title: Identity & Access
identity.description: Bring Kleff Auth or your own IDP.

audit.title: Audit-friendly
audit.description: Sessions, tokens, and key changes tracked.

dashboards.title: Dashboards
dashboards.description: See health across services at a glance.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Prometheus / Grafana friendly from day one.

cta.title: Start building on Kleff in minutes.
cta.description: Ship your next project with an open platform you can run anywhere. Explore templates, example repos, and the full Kleff stack on GitHub.

common.mega_menu_footer: Open-source-first infrastructure built for modern teams.

product.label: Product
product.tagline: Everything you need to ship modern services.

overview.label: Overview
overview.description: Deploy, scale, and observe your apps on Kleff.

runtime.label: Runtime
runtime.description: Managed runtimes tuned for modern stacks.

observability.label: Observability
observability.description: Metrics, logs, and alerts out of the box.

customer_stories.title: Built for fast-moving teams
customer_stories.description: Teams use Kleff to deploy fleets of services, keep infra observable, and stay in full control whether self-hosted or managed.

developers.label: Developers
developers.tagline: Tools that feel like they were built by devs, for devs.

docs.label: Docs
docs.description: Everything you need to get started.

api.label: API Reference
api.description: REST and CLI endpoints for automation.

changelog.label: Changelog
changelog.description: Follow platform updates week by week.

developers.footer_note: Open-source-first infrastructure built for modern teams.

solutions.label: Solutions
solutions.tagline: Kleff for teams of every size.

startups.label: Startups
startups.description: Ship faster with sane defaults and pricing.

indie.label: Indie hackers
indie.description: Pay only for what you actually use.
